name: Here Goes Muffin (itch)
description:
Made for Vagabond Dog's Moving Jam. Where the theme was... Moving.

Available to download now is a polished version of the result of the game jam. Currently working on making an entire game out of the concept, featuring: 

  • Actually being a muffin!
  • New areas!
  • New powerups!
  • Fewer bugs!

Art by Arisuki
Development by Virus610
